name: Raise3D E2 (0.8 nozzle) (Dual)
machine_start_gcode:
M605 S0 ; set to standard mode
G90 ; set printer absolute mode
M82 ; set extruder to absolute mode
M106 S0 ; fan off
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set bed temp
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] T0 ; set extruder temp
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] T1; set extruder temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] T0 ; wait for extruder temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] T1; wait for extruder temp
G28 ; home all axes
T0 ; set first toolhead
G1 Z3 F500 ; Move to Z3 for height clearance before Intro line
G92 E0 ; set position
; intro line
G1 Z0.35 F800 ;
G1 X10 Y5 F800 ;
G1 X70 Y5 E12 F200 ;
G1 Z5 E15 F200 ; Move to Z5 to prevent dragging nozzle and scratching bed
G92 E0 ; set position
T1
G92 E0 ; set position
G1 X260 Y5 F800
G1 Z0.35 F200
G1 X320 Y5 E13 F200
G1 E15 F200
G1 Z5 F200
G92 E0
T0
G1 F9000.0 ;
M117 Printing...
M1001 ; End of Start G-code
machine_end_gcode:
M1002 ; Start of End G-code
M605 S0 ; set to standard mode
G92 E0 ; set position
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M107 ; turn off fan
G91
G1 E-1 F1800 ; retract
{if max_layer_z < printable_height}G1 Z{z_offset+min(max_layer_z+2, printable_height)}{endif} F720 ; Move print head up
{if max_layer_z < printable_height}G1 Z{z_offset+min(max_layer_z+30, printable_height)}{endif} F720 ; Move print head further up
G28 X0 Y0 ; move toolheads to start positions
M84 ; stop idle hold
G90 ; set to absolute positioning
toolchange_gcode:
M104 S{nozzle_temperature[0] * 0.85} T[current_extruder]; set extruder temp
M104 S[nozzle_temperature] T[next_extruder]; set extruder temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature] T[next_extruder]; wait for extruder temp
